mapper.insert: insert into article_bookmarks (article_id, user_id, created_at) values (#{bookmark.articleId}, #{bookmark.userId}, #{bookmark.createdAt})
mapper.delete: delete from article_bookmarks where article_id = #{bookmark.articleId} and user_id = #{bookmark.userId}
mapper.select: select AB.article_id bookmarkArticleId, AB.user_id bookmarkUserId, AB.created_at bookmarkCreatedAt from article_bookmarks AB where AB.article_id = #{articleId} and AB.user_id = #{userId}
